description.p: Update, reinstall and downgrade firmware on devices supported by fwupd.
Actualitza, reinstal·la i desactualitza el microprogramari de dispositius compatibles amb fwupd.
Opdatér, geninstallér og nedgradér firmware på enheder, som understøttes af fwupd.
Firmware auf von »fwupd« unterstützten Geräten aktualisieren, neu installieren oder herabstufen.
Eguneratu, berrinstalatu eta bertsio zaharragora itzuli firmwarea, fwupd aplikazioak onartzen dituen gailuetan.
Päivitä, asenna uudelleen tai asenna aiempia versioita laiteohjelmistoista fwupd:n tukemille laitteille.
Mettre à jour, réinstaller et mettre à niveau un micrologiciel sur les appareils pris en charge par fwupd.
Mutakhirkan, pasang ulang, dan turunkan perangkat tegar pada perangkat yang didukung oleh fwupd.
Fwupd-ის მიერ მხარდაჭერილ მოწყობილობებზე მიკროკოდის განახლება, გადაყენება და და ვერსიის დაწევა.
Firmware bijwerken, herinstalleren of downgraden op door fwupd ondersteunde toestellen.
ਡਿਵਾਈਸਾਂ ਉੱਤੇ ਫਿਰਮਵੇਅਰ ਨੂੰ ਅੱਪਡੇਟ, ਮੁੜ-ਇੰਸਟਾਲ ਅਤੇ ਡਾਊਨਗਰੇਡ ਕਰਨਾ fwupd ਰਾਹੀਂ ਸਹਾਇਕ ਹੈ।
Aktualizacja, ponowna instalacja i instalacja poprzedniej wersji oprogramowania sprzętowego na urządzeniach obsługiwanych przez usługę fwupd.
Atualize, reinstale ou desatualize o firmware de dispositivos com suporte pelo fwupd.
Posodobljanje, ponovna namestitev in posodobitev strojne programske opremo na napravah, s podporo fwupd.
Uppdatera, installera om och nedgradera fast programvara på enheter som stöds av fwupd.
Оновлення, повторне встановлення та встановлення старих версій на пристрої, підтримку яких передбачено у fwupd.
Fixes the following issues:

ul.li: Do not show the estimated time to completion
Provide generic device fallbacks
Show the about dialog in the menu
Show translated device problems

description.p: This release also adds new translations.
Fixes the following issues:

ul.li: Do not create duplicate request events
Mark the application as adaptive for mobile
Do not show crazy remaining time values
Show how GUIDs are constructed in the UI
Show the 'No Releases Available' in more cases
Update the progressbar text for every percentage changed event

description.p: This is the first release for GNOME 42.

ul.li: Port to GTK4
Add the device branch to the device page
Allow installing firmware with the AFFECTS_FDE flag

description.p: Fixes the following issues

ul.li: Correctly print release flags
Enable releases leaflet gestures to be more adaptable
Hide the back button when folded

description.p: This is the first release for GNOME 41.

ul.li: Add support for showing the update message
Add support for switching branch
Send the client features at startup
Show a FDE warning when required
Show composite devices clearly
Use libhandy to make UI responsive
Use the new API from fwupd to avoid blocking the main thread

description.p: This is the first stable release in the 3.36 series:

ul.li: Dynamically show verify and releases buttons
Show device and progress when doing updates
Show the release issues if supplied in the metadata

description.p: This is the first stable release:

ul.li: Show all device metadata supported by fwupd
Add ability to install, downgrade and reinstall firmware
Add ability to unlock hardware such as TPMs
Add ability to automatically enable the LVFS and refresh the metadata
